string.text: Do not fidget, attack strictly on my command.
Victory!!! All those who are alive, come to me. Swordsman, come here and we'll talk.
Hey, Swordsman, I'm glad you're alive, and I'm glad you stopped by for a visit. Stop by and have a chat. There's another job coming up.
All right, you did the job. Let's consider that you passed the takeoff and landing course.
Swordsman, now you've got access to the camp. Come on up, let's talk.

Swordsman, speaking of the Strelka. A stalker came from a deep raid, he's called Fox. He apparently had a hard time - he asked for help. He dragged on the tail of some creatures, said that he would not last long. He might know about the shooter. So run to him and give him the coordinates.
You screwed up, Swordsman. Even though it wasn't your fault, the boys died. That happens a lot in the zone. Anyway, you passed the test. Come back, we'll talk about the substance.
Well done, Swordsman. If you carry on like that, you'll make a lot of friends. Come over to my place, we'll talk business.
Well, Swordsman, you shouldn't do that. One way or another, you passed the test, but now it's up to you to deal with Wolf and his brigade. Anyway, I'm waiting for you, I have a job to do.

Swordsman. The military dug up something at the Agroprom Research Institute. And I'm interested in it, and I guess you are too. We need to get the information and take it to the bartender at the stalker bar. Do it.
Watch out! You are near anomalies. Use the bolts to determine their boundaries.

Press the Contacts button ($$ACTION_CONTACTS$$). In the contacts and on the mini-map on the face visor you see people within 250 meters with PDAs on. Their attitude towards you is indicated there. Be careful if enemies appear there. However, bandits and hee-hee, mutants do not usually turn on the PDA, so be careful in the Zone.
To activate the map, press '$$ACTION_MAP$$'.
To activate the PDA, press '$$ACTION_ACTIVE_JOBS$$'.
In order to talk to someone, aim your crosshair at him and press '$$ACTION_USE$$'.
Find the artifact in the place marked on the map and bring it to the merchant.
Swordsman, watch closely. Next time it could be you!
Give the first aid kit to this jerk.
Swordsman!!! To hell with the artifact, you can bring it back later. Run to the wagon by the road, my men need help there! You idiots thought of firing on a helicopter. I texted you the coordinates.
Search the corpses, there might be something useful.
